agent_card.name: Scholar Consultant
agent_card.description: An agent that acts as a Scholar Consultant, helping users address and answer questions in the academic field. It provides professional answers and advice.

skills.name: Provide Academic Consultation
skills.description: Provides professional answers and advice on academic-related questions, helping users navigate and resolve issues in their field of study.
examples: What are trending research topics in computer science?
What are latest progresses in large-scale gene editing and sequencing?
